1770821006217.oldValue:
@mediaMobile{
	width: '100%',
	height: 40,
	backgroundColor: '#a6a6a6',
	flexDirection: 'row',
	justifyContent: 'space-between',
	alignItems: 'center',
	paddingLeft: 20,
	paddingRight: 30,
	shadowColor: '#000',
}
@mediaDesktop{
	width: '100%',
	height: 100,
	backgroundColor: '#a6a6a6',
	flexDirection: 'row',
	justifyContent: 'space-between',
	alignItems: 'center',
	paddingLeft: 42,
	paddingRight: 80,
	shadowColor: '#000',
	shadowOffset: { width: 0, height: 4 },
	shadowOpacity: 0.1,
	shadowRadius: 4,
}
